Nonso / ( / ˈnɒns oʊ ˈ n oʊz i eɪ / ;   a mụrụ ya na 17 Nọvemba 1978   ) bụ onye omee ejije Britain rụrụ ọrụ n'okwgo, ejije na ihe onyonyo

A maara ya nke ọma maka agwa ya dị ka Tank na RocknRolla, Sergeant Dap na Egwuregwu Ender, Abraham Kenyatta na Zoo, onyeisi ndị nche na Cinderella, Xaro Xhoan Daxos na ejije HBO Game of Thrones na Tommy Jepperd na ejije Ụtọ Tooth
A mụrụ Anozie na London, England, onye Igbo Naijiria
[ na-abụghị isi ihe a chọrọ ]  Anozie gara St Aloysius College na Highgate, London

Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Central School of Speech and Drama n'afọ 2002,  na n'oge okpomọkụ nke otu afọ ahụ, ọ jijere otu agwa n'akwụkwọ ejije  William Shakespeare 's King Lear, wee nweta ihe nrite Ian Charleson n' afọ 2004 maka ihe mmepụta ya na Othello
E goro Anozie n'afọ 2006 ka ọ weta olu maka anụ ọhịa bea Iorek Byrnison na mmegharị ihe nkiri nke Philip Pullman 's Northern Lights
Ian McKellen nọchiri Anozie ọnwa abụọ tupu ewepụta ejije ahụ
Onye isi ihe nkiri ahụ, Chris Weitz, gwara Empire : "Ọ bụ mkpebi ụlọ ọrụ
Ị nwere ike ịghọta ihe mere ị ga-eji tụba Ian McKellen maka ihe ọ bụla
Mana ịhapụ Nonso bụ otu n'ime ihe kacha wute m na ihe nkiri a
Achọrọ m ikwu banyere Nonso na ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị maara ejije eme m zutere na England kemgbe m na-arụ ọrụ ebe a n'ihi na ugbu a ọ bụ ya na-esote Mike Leigh [ejije]
Mana ọ bụ, ee, nke ahụ bụụrụ m ụdị ụbọchị ọjọọ
Achọrọ m  igospụta ịhụnanya mụ  n'ebe ọrụ Nonso nọ
ya ka m mere."
Anozie rụrụ obere ọrụ dị ka Think Tank na ejije Guy Ritchie RocknRolla na Frank Mace na Joe Wright 's Atonement
Ọ gbara onye ndu na Cass ejije mpụ Britain nke 2008 na-ejiji ndụ Cass Pennant
Na 2009, ọ pụtara na  nkwado nke BBC TV akụkụ atọ 2003 Iraq War drama, Occupation, ebe ọ gbara US Marine tụgharịrị bụrụ onye ọrụ agha nnọroonwe
Na 2011, ọ ji jiri Artus, onye omekome Zamoran na ezigbo enyi Conan, na Conan the Barbarian
N'afọ ahụ, a chọrọ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ nke Xaro Xhoan Daxos na usoro HBO Game of Thrones ma nye ya agwa dị ka Jackson Burke na The Grey
Ọ na-ejiji Samson na ejije TV nke History Channel nke Akwụkwọ Nsọ
Na 2013, Anozie pụtara na ejije Ender's Game dị ka Sergeant Dap,   site n'afọ 2013 ruo 2014 ọ rụrụ ọrụ Renfield na usoro NBC Dracula
Na Nọvemba 2014, Anozie soro mee ejije na CBS Summer drama Zoo, nke e nwetara  n'akwụkwọ akụkọ James Patterson na Michael Ledwidge
E wepụtara Zoo na June 30, 2015.
Ọrụ redio nke Anozie gụnyere ọrụ Joe na 2011 BBC Radio 4 Classic Serial mmepụta nke Edna Ferber's Show Boat
N'afọ 2019, Anozie gosipụtara onye mmegide, Cargo, n'ejije Amazon Prime Video nke Guava Island, nke ndị so mee ya bụ Donald Glover na Rihanna
